articles.description: Tom Cruise will be 60 years old, and will have played Ethan Hunt for over a quarter-of-a-century by the time the now delayed Mission: Impossible 8 hits theatres.
articles.content: The theatrical release of Mission: Impossible 7 and Mission: Impossible 8 has been delayed by Paramount, which means that when the eighth film opens in 2022, Tom Cruise will be 60 years old. The seventh instalment in the franchise was initially set to hit the… [+1328 chars]

articles.title: Malayalam actor Ravi Vallathol dies at 67 in Thiruvananthapuram - India Today
articles.description: Film and television actor Ravi Vallathol died of age-related ailments at his residence in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala.
articles.content:
Malayalam actor Ravi Vallathol, aged 67, breathed his last at his residence in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. Reportedly, he was unwell for a couple of years and had succumbed to age-related illness today (April 25).
The actor had stopped doing films and Malaya… [+1359 chars]

articles.title: Kanye West officially now a billionaire: Forbes - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Forbes magazine has finally included Kanye West on their list of billionaires of the world. The magazine said West has been pressing them to be listed for years.
articles.content: Rapper Kanye West is now a billionaire thanks largely to the basketball shoes bearing his name that he developed with Adidas, Forbes magazine said Friday. The rough figure of the wealth of Kim Kardashian’s hubby is $1.3 billion, the magazine said in announcin… [+1011 chars]
